name: SmolCraft
description:
"m6x11" font is created by Daniel Linssen
@managore / managore.itch.io/m6x11

Description

This is half-finished game for "8 Bits to Infinity ~ Two Button Jam".

You defend you base against waves of zerg some kind of hostile alien life. Instead of building towers, you train space marines and "manage" economy. It sort-of idle game :P

Things you can do:
* Train marines
* Train workers (they gather resource)
* Temporary boost solders attack and speed (I had no time for cooldown imp. :) )
* Game Over screen with score (time survived).

Jam limitation was: only two buttons.
And theme was a song/music track.
